title: Getting lag after I changed my modem.
body:
I have recently changed my modem because the last one's wifi option was broken, and since so, I have been getting lag spikes sometimes, but the strange thing is the ping on the top right corner does not go up, it stays the same but it lags for like 2 seconds.

My brother on Xbox also gets some lag spikes, anyone knows what could be the problem?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like the new modem may be having some issues. As a whole, WiFi tends to be very unreliable if you're looking for a consistent, stable connection, but there are some things that could be done to improve Wireless performance. I'd recommend reaching out to your ISP's support if they provided you the modem, otherwise, I'd swap out the modem for another, temporarily.

Let me know what you find.
